Test Steps:
1. Open Postman
2. Set Method = POST
3. Enter URL /auth/login
4. Body → raw → JSON:
{ "email": "john@mail.com", "password": "changeme" }
5. Click Send
Same as above but with wrong password
Same as above but with unregistered email

Expected result: 400 Bad Request – "email must not be empty", "password must not be empty"
405 Method Not Allowed – only POST allowed

Test Steps:
Wrong Content-Type (text/plain).
This means you will send a Body in a format other than JSON, while the API is expected to be Content-Type: application/json.
Expected result:
The server rejects the request and returns:

415 Unsupported Media Type or

400 Bad Request with a message indicating that the Content-Type is incorrect.

Test Steps: Send valid refresh token to get new access token
